original_title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Waterway of the Tsars
overview: This boat cruise travels across numerous rivers, canals & lakes within the heart of the former Tsar's realm, past monasteries & timber built churches to as far as Saint Petersburg. Our journey begins in Moscow, where both Tsar rule & soviet communism gave the city its present day appearance. A most beautiful route travelling rivers, canals & lakes, in the atmospheric wake of the Russian soul!
title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Waterway of the Tsars
